jobDescription: Data Engineers Data Engineers We are looking for Data Engineers to join our Austin or San Francisco engineering teams and help advance our state-of-the-art Big Data Platform. We offer an exciting start up environment as part of CSC’s fast growing Big Data and Analytics group, providing competitive benefits and free daily lunch at our Austin office.
